entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon then 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 14.
